mapper.sql: SELECT t1.ACTIONCODE, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.MEMO, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.WFACTIONID, t1.WFACTIONNAME, t1.WFWORKFLOWID, t11.WFWORKFLOWNAME FROM T_SRFWFACTION t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFWFWORKFLOW t11 ON t1.WFWORKFLOWID = t11.WFWORKFLOWID

SELECT t1.`ACTIONCODE`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`MEMO`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`WFACTIONID`, t1.`WFACTIONNAME`, t1.`WFWORKFLOWID`, t11.`WFWORKFLOWNAME` FROM `T_WFACTION` t1 LEFT JOIN T_WFWORKFLOW t11 ON t1.WFWORKFLOWID = t11.WFWORKFLOWID

SELECT t1.ACTIONCODE, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.MEMO, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.WFACTIONID, t1.WFACTIONNAME, t1.WFWORKFLOWID, t11.WFWORKFLOWNAME FROM T_SRFWFACTION t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFWFWORKFLOW t11 ON t1.WFWORKFLOWID = t11.WFWORKFLOWID

SELECT t1.ACTIONCODE AS ACTIONCODE, t1.CREATEDATE AS CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN AS CREATEMAN, t1.MEMO AS MEMO, t1.UPDATEDATE AS UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN AS UPDATEMAN, t1.WFACTIONID AS WFACTIONID, t1.WFACTIONNAME AS WFACTIONNAME, t1.WFWORKFLOWID AS WFWORKFLOWID, t11.WFWORKFLOWNAME AS WFWORKFLOWNAME FROM T_SRFWFACTION t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFWFWORKFLOW t11 ON t1.WFWORKFLOWID = t11.WFWORKFLOWID

SELECT t1.ACTIONCODE AS ACTIONCODE, t1.CREATEDATE AS CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN AS CREATEMAN, t1.MEMO AS MEMO, t1.UPDATEDATE AS UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN AS UPDATEMAN, t1.WFACTIONID AS WFACTIONID, t1.WFACTIONNAME AS WFACTIONNAME, t1.WFWORKFLOWID AS WFWORKFLOWID, t11.WFWORKFLOWNAME AS WFWORKFLOWNAME FROM T_SRFWFACTION t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFWFWORKFLOW t11 ON t1.WFWORKFLOWID = t11.WFWORKFLOWID

SELECT t1.[ACTIONCODE], t1.[CREATEDATE], t1.[CREATEMAN], t1.[MEMO], t1.[UPDATEDATE], t1.[UPDATEMAN], t1.[WFACTIONID], t1.[WFACTIONNAME], t1.[WFWORKFLOWID], t11.[WFWORKFLOWNAME] FROM [T_SRFWFACTION] t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFWFWORKFLOW t11 ON t1.WFWORKFLOWID = t11.WFWORKFLOWID
